snippet: Michael C. Woodford has ended his proxy fight to return to the company, saying he was unable to garner the support of Olympus’s Japanese institutional investors and creditors.
abstract: Former Olympus Corp chief executive Michael C. Woodford ends his proxy fight to return to the company, saying he was unable to garner the support of firm's Japanese institutional investors and creditors.
lead_paragraph: Michael C. Woodford has ended his proxy fight to return to the company, saying he was unable to garner the support of Olympus’s Japanese institutional investors and creditors.

headline.seo: Woodford Admits Defeat in Effort to Return to Olympus
headline.main: With Olympus Managers Still Entrenched, an Ousted Chief Drops His Sword
headline.print_headline: With Olympus Managers Still Entrenched, an Ousted Chief Drops His Sword
